Generate a random adjacency matrix with a dense partial clique

generate_partial_clique.Rd

Generate a random adjacency matrix with a dense partial clique

Usage

generate_partial_clique(
  n,
  clique_fraction,
  clique_edge_density,
  outside_edge_density = 0.05,
  seed = 500,
  diag_one = TRUE
)

Arguments

n

Positive integer: number of nodes (matrix dimension).

clique_fraction

Fraction of nodes belonging to the clique (0–1).

clique_edge_density

Edge density within the clique (0–1).

outside_edge_density

Edge probability for every non‑clique pair (including clique–non‑clique pairs). Default 0.05.

seed

fixes seed. Default 500

diag_one

Logical; if TRUE (default) place 1’s on the diagonal, otherwise leave 0’s (strict graph‑theory convention).

Value

List with five elements:

adj_mat

Original n × n symmetric 0/1 matrix.

adj_mat_ordered

Same matrix permuted so clique block is upper‑left.

node_order

Permutation putting clique nodes first.

clique_nodes

Indices (original ordering) of clique nodes.

edge_target

# edges required inside the clique.
